程序包 com.oligei.ticketgathering.service

接口 ActivityService

所有已知实现类:
ActivityServiceImpl
public interface ActivityService

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    java.lang.Boolean add​(java.lang.String activity)
    parse the string info of activity and save it
    java.lang.Boolean clear()
    clear cache which have home cache and select search
    java.lang.Boolean delete​(java.lang.Integer activityId)
    use activityId to delete activity and all the actitem
    java.util.List<ActivitySortpage> findActivityByCategoryHome()
    call findActivityByOneCategoryHome 8 times to find a list of activitySortpage for homepage
    java.lang.Boolean initActivity()
    dd all the activitySortpage into cache
    java.util.List<ActivitySortpage> recommendOnContent​(java.lang.Integer userId, java.lang.Integer activityId)
    use userId and activityId to get ActivitySortpage that is the same kind of activity and haven't been seen by the user
    java.util.List<ActivitySortpage> search​(java.lang.String value, java.lang.Integer page)
    use index to get search id, then get data from cache and return
    java.lang.Integer searchPageNum​(java.lang.String value)
    how many pages?
    java.util.List<ActivitySortpage> selectSearch​(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String city, java.lang.Integer page)
    use index to get search id, then get data from cache and return
    java.lang.Integer selectSearchPageNum​(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String city)
    how many pages?
